mapper.sql: JOINT_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, JOINT_ORG_FLOW, JOINT_ORG_NAME, SESSION_NUMBER, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, spe_id, spe_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
JOINT_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, JOINT_ORG_FLOW, JOINT_ORG_NAME, RECORD_STATUS,spe_id, spe_name from RES_JOINT_ORG
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into RES_JOINT_ORG (JOINT_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, JOINT_ORG_FLOW, JOINT_ORG_NAME, SESSION_NUMBER, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{jointFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jointOrgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jointOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

into RES_JOINT_ORG (JOINT_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, JOINT_ORG_FLOW, JOINT_ORG_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, SESSION_NUMBER, spe_id, spe_name) values (#{resJointOrg.jointFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.jointOrgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.jointOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resJointOrg.sessionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{resJointOrg.speId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resJointOrg.speName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update RES_JOINT_ORG
JOINT_FLOW = #{record.jointFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_FLOW = #{record.orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{record.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOINT_ORG_FLOW = #{record.jointOrgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOINT_ORG_NAME = #{record.jointOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SESSION_NUMBER = #{record.sessionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOINT_ORG_FLOW = #{jointOrgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JOINT_ORG_NAME = #{jointOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_FLOW = #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPE_ID = #{speId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPE_NAME = #{speName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where JOINT_FLOW = #{jointFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
